function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited infrastructure in informal urban settlements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data about informal settlements prior to and during emergencies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inappropriate responses to disease outbreaks in informal settlements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Informal urban settlements with limited access to healthcare may experience a rapid spread of contagious diseases due to overcrowding and inadequate sanitation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of official recognition and support for informal settlements may result in limited access to healthcare resources and public health interventions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to essential services such as water and space","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of accurate and timely information about covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal distribution of resources and access to healthcare based on income levels","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of digital technology may compromise privacy and data security.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying solely on digital technology for pandemic policy and response may lead to a false sense of security.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal access to digital technology may exacerbate disparities in pandemic response and containment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socioeconomic inequalities and healthcare disparities amplified by digital health initiatives.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy infringement and increased risk among individuals with mental illness or restricted access to necessities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid diagnosis and risk prediction of covid-19 through ai and machine learning algorithms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of cloud-based ai-assisted ct service for detecting covid-19 pneumonia","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global availability of open-source deep convolutional neural network design for detecting covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with quarantine and isolation measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate reporting of symptoms in self-reported surveys","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of digital technology for quarantine and self-isolation monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai-powered surveillance for monitoring and restricting public gatherings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforcement of quarantine with tracking devices and fines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential privacy concerns with the collection and storage of personal health data through mobile applications.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of missed exposure and contact tracing due to the absence of mobile phones or mobile service.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low adoption rates of contact tracing applications leading to reduced effectiveness of the mitigation strategy.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of widespread testing and screening technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of digital systems for screening vital signs and self-reporting of symptoms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy and surveillance concerns with aggressive contact tracing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ai predictive models trained on chinese samples may not be generalizable to other populations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Noise from social media and online traffic may lead to overfitted ai models and inaccurate trend predictions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate screening and testing strategies in some countries may result in underreporting of covid-19 cases and transmission rates.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of big data and ai for tracking people and infection spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of mobile phones and social media for real-time data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time data reporting and sharing within healthcare organizations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High transmissibility of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Varied success in managing the burden of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective pandemic management despite preparedness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater treatment plant wwtp inflow","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unspecific signal in rt-qpcr testing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor removal of sars-cov-2 in conventional activated-sludge wwtp","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete reduction of viral load in wastewater treatment systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of gene fragments in effluents","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unlikely infectivity and replication-competence of released viral particles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large emission of sars-cov-2 gene equivalents into receiving water bodies from wastewater treatment plants wwtps .","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in viral shedding from infected persons and uncertainty in viral gene copies detected in human excreta.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variations in virus rna recovery affecting correlations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in estimated prevalence data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in wastewater composition affecting bioindicator utilization","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection limit of the method not optimized for lower incidence levels","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in catchment area sizes and wastewater flow","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation between measured sars-cov-2 load and estimated covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
